segments.text: When you smell them , they affect your nervous system .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you were supposed to put them in some kind of burner with a candle ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can do that , too . Both methods have a healing effect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what's your illness ... shopping fever , sale-itis ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ha-ha ... I'm just fatigued . And tomorrow is a big day .
segments.speaker: S1
